title: A Feast for Crows
description: Few books have captivated the imagination and won the devotion and praise of readers and critics everywhere as has George R. R. Martinâ€™s monumental epic cycle of high fantasy. Now, in A Feast for Crows, Martin delivers the long-awaited fourth book of his landmark series, as a kingdom torn asunder finds itself at last on the brink of peace . . . only to be launched on an even more terrifying course of destruction.
author: George R.R. Martin
